    main(String[]) - Static method in class app.Main
    Application entry point for the Internship Management System.
    Main - Class in app
    Main application entry point for the Internship Management System.
    Main() - Constructor for class app.Main
     
    MainMenuBoundary - Class in boundary
    Main menu boundary class that serves as the entry point for the Internship Placement Management System.
    MainMenuBoundary(LoginBoundary, StudentBoundary, CompanyRepBoundary, CareerCenterStaffBoundary, CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary) - Constructor for class boundary.MainMenuBoundary
    Constructs a new MainMenuBoundary with all required role-specific sub-boundaries.
    markApplicationSuccessful(String, String) - Method in class controller.CompanyRepController
    Marks an application as SUCCESSFUL (offer extended to applicant).
    markApplicationUnsuccessful(String, String) - Method in class controller.CompanyRepController
    Marks an application as UNSUCCESSFUL (rejected).
    markSuccessful() - Method in class entity.InternshipApplication
    Marks the application as SUCCESSFUL (offer made to student).
    markUnsuccessful() - Method in class entity.InternshipApplication
    Marks the application as UNSUCCESSFUL (rejected by company).
    markWithdrawn() - Method in class entity.InternshipApplication
    Marks the application as WITHDRAWN.
    MAX_ACTIVE_APPLICATIONS - Static variable in class entity.Student
    Maximum number of active applications allowed per student.
    MAX_POSTINGS - Static variable in class entity.CompanyRep
    Maximum number of active postings allowed per company representative.
    menu(String) - Method in class boundary.CareerCenterStaffBoundary
    Main menu loop for career center staff.
    menu(String) - Method in class boundary.CompanyRepBoundary
    Main menu loop for a company representative.
    menu(String) - Method in class boundary.StudentBoundary
    Main student menu loop that presents the student dashboard and handles user interaction.
